about.heading: Hello World!
about.description:
I am a FullStack developer passionate about technology, with a strong motivation for design and frontend development. My expertise lies in creating modern and intuitive interfaces that seamlessly connect people with technology.
While I also work on backend development and database management, I find my greatest passion in bringing the frontend to life, where design and user experience come together

I am always looking to innovate and explore new tools, technologies, and methods to build personalized and effective web solutions. I enjoy working with a practical and creative approach, combining functionality and aesthetic sensibility to deliver results that exceed expectations.

projects.title: Projects
projects.working:
Project under development.

This system aims to optimize management and administrative processes through modern full-stack architecture.
projects.landingInmo:
Client Project.

Real estate landing page built with WP CMS and styled using CSS and Tailwind CSS. Custom multistep form (no Elementor Pro) optimized for lead generation.
projects.blog:
Blog - News and Technology.

Portfolio extension where I publish articles on technology, combined with the most relevant news extracted from my social media feed.
projects.project:
Format Conversion Tool.

Online tool to convert images, fonts, and videos. Images are converted on the frontend.
The backend can be used locally and is required for video, mp3, and font conversions.
projects.project1:
Integrated Maps.

An interactive map to explore the most important places in Valencia, offers Light/Dark theme and multi-language support. HTML/CSS/JS + Bootstrap
projects.project2:
FrontEnd prototype.

A transfer website in the Valencia area for booking private trips.
Prototype with Angular 17 and Bootstrap
